name: Riddles PRO - Great Challenge for your Brain and Erudition. Fascinating intellectual game
name_original: Riddles PRO - Great Challenge for your Brain and Erudition. Fascinating intellectual game
description:
Like to solve the riddles? Tired of boring puzzles? Want to to strain the brain? Then this game is for you!

* Show your erudition and solve all the riddles
* Share riddles with your friends
* More than 90 interesting riddles in one application

You will earn coins for the completed level that you can spend on tips to get the most challenging levels.

PRO version features:
* 2,200 additional coins on start
* Level completion reward 50% more
* Tips are 20% cheaper
